issue.title: Allow gzclient window to be made smaller

content.raw:
I was just about to report the same problem ... on my smaller screen gazebo takes up the whole width so I can't even see the full window because part of it is occluded by the unity bar. 

A related issue is #260 which causes the gazebo window to come up really wide most of the time (actually I'm not sure what influences the initial window size because it seems to be sort of non-deterministic, at least on a multi monitor setup ... 90% of the time it's way wider than desired or even possible though).
